Name: Highway Thru Hell
Title: Junior's Job
Desc: Jamie's 13-year-old son gets a lesson; an explosive clean-up; fishing a truck out of a lake.
LongDescription: Jamie's 13-year-old son gets a lesson in wreck recovery after a semi crashes down a 150-foot embankment; rock slides north of Hope trigger road closures and an explosive clean-up; Dylan puts on his hip waders to fish a truck out of a lake.
